info.title: Meetup Topics API
info.description: The API for managing Meetup topics.

get.description: Returns a list of Meetup topic categories

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Parameter for requesting optional response properties

parameters.name: lat,lon,radius
parameters.description: Use a given lat/lon/radius (miles) to search best_topics for instead of using the members lat/lon.  When present, all three are required.

get.description: Recommends suggestions for group topics based on a text search or other topics

parameters.name: exclude_topics
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of topic ids to exclude from the recommendations

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Defines a language preference for ordering results. Valid values are frptitdeesen_us. You may also substitute this with the Accept-Language header

parameters.name: other_topics
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of topic ids to inform recommendations

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Target number of recommendations to return. Defaults to 36.

get.description: API method for accessing meetup topics

parameters.name: member_id
parameters.description: Return topics a target member is subscribed to

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Return topics that match the specified name (e.g. Digital Photography, Classical Music)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Return topics related to a list of search terms [separate search keywords with +s]

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Return members that RSVPd to events with these ID numbers [separated by commas]
